title: If I say Harley Davidson ...
content:
Fat bald white guy with a beard and too little shirt.   
   
hhp
author: hrant

comments.content:
OK, sorry, he could be Hispanic.   
C'mon, Tiff, you don't have to be an immigrant to associate that demographic with Harleys.   
   
How about this for a logo: a stylized beard and sunglasses, no other features, front view.   
   
hhp

Torn denim vest   
Rolling Thunder   
Tatoos

[http://www.choppersinc.com/index\_html.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20051127115111/http:/www.choppersinc.com/index_html.html)   
   
Tiff someone posted this site maybe it can give you some inspiration

potato potato   
slow   
agricultural   
poor brakes   
(I know the v-rod is better equipped and better looking)   
accessories   
(both on and off bike)
